"Always going the extra mile for the customer." "Mike and his team delivered as promised and now we have the pool of our dreams." "Highly recommend using this company."

Regal Custom Pools designed a grotto for me to mesh with my existing pool, and built it to match the landscaping.  Not an easy task when the pool wasn't really built for a grotto.  They are a great company, and the owner is actively … More

We wanted to remodel our pool and move the hot tub from the middle of the pool to the end.  The original hot was quite large and constricted the middle of the pool.  Deleting it and moving it to the end would open up the entire pool … More

Our pool was 20+ years old and was in need of full renovation. After new coping, tile, plaster and a redesign of the spa I barely recognize it. It’s so nice it makes me wish I had done it earlier. I would definitely use Regal again. Get the most out of Google Maps Map data ©2025 GoogleUnited StatesTermsPrivacySend Product Feedback
